scripts.buildClient: rollup --config rollup.client.config.js; cat src/Adobe-SDKs/VisitorAPI.js src/Adobe-SDKs/AppMeasurement.js src/AdobeClientSideKit-temp.js > AdobeKit.js; cp AdobeKit.js dist/AdobeClientSideKit.js; rm src/AdobeClientSideKit-temp.js
scripts.buildServer: rollup --config rollup.server.config.js; cat src/Adobe-SDKs/VisitorAPI.js src/AdobeServerSideKit-temp.js > AdobeServerSideKit.js; cp AdobeServerSideKit.js dist/AdobeServerSideKit.js; rm src/AdobeServerSideKit-temp.js
scripts.test: npm run testClient && npm run testServer
